title: Homemade Butter Tortillas
instructions: Combine the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl.
Melt the butter in warm water and mix it into the dry ingredients until a dough is formed.
Cover the dough and let it sit for 30 minutes.
Divide the dough into approximately 12 equal-sized balls.
Use flour and a rolling pin to roll each dough ball into a circle.
Cook each tortilla on a pan or comal over medium heat for about 2 minutes per side or until they are brown and bubbly.
